name: WP Breathe
author: Joseph Fusco

sections.description:
As a developer, it can sometimes get confusing flipping back and forth between production and development sites. This plugin offers a gentle and anthropomorphic reminder that you are logged into a production site while still allowing unobstructive use.

Demo

See .gif (Actual animation is much smoother)

Usage

Download and activate plugin. No configuration required.

Animation Requirements

  • Must be logged in as admin
  • Cannot be a .dev domain (plugin ignores them)
  • Browser must support css animations

Browser Support

  • IE 10+
  • Edge
  • Firefox
  • Chrome
  • Safari
  • Opera
  • iOS Safari
  • Android Browser
  • Chrome for Android

Contributing

Contributions are welcome on GitHub. https://github.com/josephfusco/wp-breathe
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘wp-breathe’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. If not a .dev site, watch site start to ‘breathe’

short_description: Easily identify a production site by making it visually breathe for admins.
